title: Fix sidebar text visibility, real backend data, working buttons, remove Refer & Earn

requirements.text: Fix sidebar text and icon visibility: all navigation labels (Dashboard, Contacts, Pipeline, Templates, Reports, Other Services, Admin, Settings, Sign Out) must render in white or light-colored text/icons so they are clearly readable against the purple sidebar background.

quotes: Sidebar text visible - White/light colored text jo purple background par clearly dikhe

acceptanceCriteria: All sidebar menu item labels are white or light-colored and clearly legible against the purple background
Icons beside each menu item are also light-colored and visible
Active/selected menu item has a visually distinct highlight that remains readable

requirements.text: Remove the 'Refer & Earn' menu item completely from the sidebar navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar does not contain a 'Refer & Earn' link or section
Remaining sidebar items are: Dashboard, Contacts, Pipeline, Templates, Reports, Other Services, Admin, Settings, Sign Out

requirements.text: Implement persistent backend storage in the Motoko canister for all core CRM entities: leads/contacts, deals, and pipeline stages. All CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) must persist data across sessions.

quotes: Data Storage - yeh data permanently save ho (backend mein store ho)

acceptanceCriteria: Leads/contacts added by the user are stored in stable backend state and survive canister upgrades
Deals added by the user are stored in stable backend state
All data is retrievable via query calls and returns only user-entered records

requirements.text: Dashboard must display only real data fetched from the backend. All metrics (lead count, deal count, pipeline stats, etc.) must start at 0 when no data has been entered and automatically update as data is added.

quotes: Dashboard mein sirf actual entered data dikhega (shuruat mein 0)
jaise-jaise data add ho waise-waise update ho

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard shows 0 for all counters and charts on a fresh start with no data
After adding a lead or deal, the dashboard stats reflect the new totals without a full page reload
No hardcoded or sample/mock data is displayed on the dashboard

requirements.text: Pipeline page must display only deals that have been actually added by the user, fetched from the backend. It must start empty and update automatically when new deals are added.

quotes: Pipeline mein sirf added deals dikhengi
jaise-jaise data add ho waise-waise update ho

acceptanceCriteria: Pipeline board is empty when no deals have been added
Deals appear in the correct stage column after being added
No hardcoded or sample deals are shown
Moving a deal between stages updates the backend and is reflected immediately

requirements.text: Make all action buttons fully functional: 'Add Contact', 'Add Lead', 'Add Deal', and any other create/edit/delete buttons must open their respective forms, submit data to the backend, and reflect changes in the UI.

quotes: ye sare button kam nahi kar raha hai
All Buttons Working - Add Contact, Add Deal, sabhi buttons properly kaam karenge

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Add Contact' opens the contact/lead form dialog and successfully saves to the backend
Clicking 'Add Deal' opens the deal form dialog and successfully saves to the backend
Edit and delete buttons on leads, contacts, and deals all work correctly
Success/error toast notifications appear after form submissions
Lists and counters update immediately after any create/edit/delete action

constraints: Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
Keep all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo single actor
Sidebar navigation items must remain: Dashboard, Contacts, Pipeline, Templates, Reports, Other Services, Admin, Settings, Sign Out (no Refer & Earn)
nonGoals: Templates page full implementation (placeholder is acceptable)
Reports page full implementation (placeholder is acceptable)
Real-time WebSocket updates (React Query polling or manual refetch is sufficient)
